channel.title: headphones not working
channel.description: i'm trying to play black mesa with my headphones, but the sound keeps on coming out of the speakers, even if i set headphones on the audio options. is there a way to fix this problem? thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: headphones not working
item.dc:creator: noxxone
item.description:
vktech:

Are you sure your headphone jack is working? I use headphones for Black Mesa with no problem…

sorry it was my fault, i think there was some conflict with a windows upgrade installing… i rebooted my pc and the headphones were working!

Read full topic
